channel.title: The Daily Pratchett
channel.description: A quote from Sir Terry Pratchett every day.

item.title: 22-Jan-17
item.description:
"No running with scythes!"

- Terry Pratchett, Thief of Time

item.title: 21-Jan-17
item.description:
"...my father is the Emperor of Klatch and my mother is a small tray of raspberry puddings."

Agnes tells Christine about herself - Terry Pratchett, Maskerade

item.title: 20-Jan-17
item.description:
"And this had been the way things were for as far back as the frogs could remember [footnote: About three seconds. Frogs don't have good memories]."

- Terry Pratchett, Wings

item.title: 19-Jan-17
item.description:
"That seems to point up a significant difference between Europeans and Americans. A European says: "I can't understand this, what's wrong with me?" An American says: "I can't understand this, what's wrong with him?""

- Terry Pratchett, alt.fan.pratchett

item.title: 18-Jan-17
item.description:
"Tourist, Rincewind decided, meant "idiot"."

- Terry Pratchett, The Colour of Magic
